title.rendered: Workshop for school students on basic manners

content.rendered: A workshop on basic manners to be followed in the classroom and school was conducted for the students of Vallabh Ashram, Valsad. Students of class VI, VII & VIII attended the session and shared various experiences regarding their day to day activities in the classroom and school. The children learnt a lot from the workshop and pledged not to talk during class, respect parents and teachers, stop telling lies etc.
